Text: It's an mp4 file.... What media player do I use to watch it?

plays almost everything and it's free:
http://www.videolan.org/

in addition: the free Quicktime player will play those files just fine as well - Videolan however is more universal!
Thanks for the upload, very nice video to watch while enjoying a cuban .. cigar that is ..
